body_html: you guys are right, the except case has to be modified to: from yaml import Loader as YamlLoader. The original issue (my guess) is that your pyyaml had some compile error and the CLoader wasn't successfully installed.
body_text: you guys are right, the except case has to be modified to: from yaml import Loader as YamlLoader. The original issue (my guess) is that your pyyaml had some compile error and the CLoader wasn't successfully installed.
body: you guys are right, the `except` case has to be modified to: `from yaml import Loader as YamlLoader`. The original issue (my guess) is that your pyyaml had some compile error and the CLoader wasn't successfully installed.
